name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Personal reinventionkey because in most cases only asset companies have are people. So unless peope reinvent, hard to innovate. #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Three keys to change peoples mindsets. Educate. Incentivize. Remove fear of failing. #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Relationships important but most people barely have time to have relationships with people so why would they have it with brands? #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Marketers must realize the only way a company changes is by changing people or peoples mindsets. Therefore reinvent yourself! #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Marketers must not forget the importance of story telling and customer relationships but they must also embrace technology #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Marketers must go to basics which is understanding and meeting customer requirements. They must know what their brand MEANS #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Yes changing mindset to abundance a key. Most marketers think zero sum game but it is not necessarily true anymore #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Social influence works if you are authentic. If you are on the take you will be judged a fake. #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: Challenges are marketing is about facilitating self marketing. Its about not messages only but utilities, services. Its agility. #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: The opportunities are there are more ways to tell stories and deliver value. More ways to find the right person at right time #mediachat

name: Rishad Tobaccowala
text: What happens when all of us make content that is often more compelling than the big companies. Your kids stuff for instance.. #mediachat

text: maybe bacon is king? #mediachat

text: google would not exist without content but they monetize it.This is the big issue. King Content losing wealth. Navigator rich. #mediachat

text: Peoples Network is the best way to describe what is social. Its everything from Facebook to blogs. Its people talking to people. #mediachat

text: Content is not king. Access to content is king. Google makes more money than all the content companies combined. #mediachat

text: Message is important. But so is the medium. In fact most future marketing will be about utilities and services and not messsages #mediachat

text: The connection engine is the best way to describe the Internet. Its people connecting to share, transact, express, discover... #mediachat

text: start ups think with a blank page. That plus a longer runway due to venture capital is the only asset they have vs incumbents #mediachat

text: Many organizations do change. See Procter and Gamble which has navigated change in marketing. Or Google who went mobile fast #mediachat

text: The best way forward is to start with a fresh sheet of paper. Consider how you would beat your company. Then do it! #mediachat
